metadata.title: CVE-2019-19272 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in tls_verify_crl in ProFTPD before 1.3.6. Direct dereference of a NULL pointer (a variable initialized to NULL) leads to a crash when validating the certificate of a client connecting to the server in a TLS client/server mutual-authentication setup.

criterions.comment: proftpd-dfsg package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.6-6build2').
